overview.summary: Parameters for connection to the Firebird Service Manager.

property.name: UserPassword
property.summary: Password for the Firebird user account.

property.name: DataSource
property.summary: Server name for establish the connection.

property.name: Port
property.summary: Port number in the server for establish the connection.

property.name: Database
property.summary: Database path to establish the connection.

property.name: Packetsize
property.summary: Size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of Firebird Server.

property.name: ServerType
property.summary: When 0 the provider will use the GDS implementation used for connections to Firebird Super or Classic servers, when 1 the provider will use the GDS implementation used for connections to the Firebird embedded server.

constructor.name: ctor
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of class.
